title: Day or Night
content:
Up in the sky is the red, hot sun. The sun gives us light and keeps us warm.

At night, we cannot see the sun, but the sun is still there.

Why can't we see the sun at night? The Earth moves around the sun. At night, the sun is on the other side of the Earth.

For example, when it is dark in Canada, the sun is shining in China.
